analysis.description: GGToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol#317-324) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol:
	Contract GGToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol#167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

GGToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol#291-295) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol#294)

GGToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol#317-324)
	- /unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol#322-323
GGToken.MONTH should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x63261c36308e143434e75a3e40773e4ff1ba8979.sol#119-120)
